Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ users
    + description (column)
    + email (column)
    + status (column)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN email citext NOT NULL;

ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN description public.custom_text;

ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN status public.status_enum DEFAULT 'active';
